<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.Login_Locate_SSO_Google_Captcha</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>Client callable public script include for server side validation of google captcha</description>
        <name>Login_Locate_SSO_Google_Captcha</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var Login_Locate_SSO_Google_Captcha = Class.create();
Login_Locate_SSO_Google_Captcha.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    isPublic: function() {
        return true;
    },

    verifyCaptcha: function() {
        var grc = this.getParameter('sysparm_grc');
        try {
            if (!grc) {
                return false;
            }
            // Create REST message to check the passed token with Google recaptcha service:
            var r = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            r.setHttpMethod('post');
            r.setEndpoint('https://www.google.com/recaptcha/api/siteverify');

            var secret = gs.getProperty('glide.login.locate.sso.google.captcha.secret');
            if (!secret) {
                gs.error("Google recaptcha secret property - 'glide.login.locate.sso.google.captcha.secret' not set");
                return false;
            }

            var Encrypter = new GlideEncrypter();
            r.setQueryParameter('secret', Encrypter.decrypt(secret));
            r.setQueryParameter('response', grc);

            var response = r.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            var parser = new JSONParser();
            var parsed = parser.parse(responseBody);
            return parsed.success;
        } catch (ex) {

            var message = ex.message;
            gs.error("Captcha validation failed. " + message);
            return false;
        }
    },
	
    type: 'Login_Locate_SSO_Google_Captcha'
});]]></script>
